Caroline Kamya (amụrụ n'afọ 1974) bụ onye Briten na Uganda nke na-eduzi ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri
A mụrụ Kamya ma zụlite ya na Uganda, Kenya na UK.
Kamya nwere nzere BSc na Architecture na Urban design na MA na TV Documentary site na Goldsmiths College.
Kamya enwetala ihe karịrị onyinye iri na mba ụwa ma rụọ ọrụ na telivishọn na London tupu o guzobe ụlọ mmepụta ihe na Kampala, IVAD International.

Ihe nkiri izizi Kamya, Imani (2010), meghere na 2010 Berlin Film Festival, ebe a họpụtara ya maka Best First Feature. Chips and Liver Girls, nke ya na onye nduzi Danish Boris Bertram duziri na 2010, bụ ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi banyere ụmụ agbọghọ Ugandan na "ndị ikom na-akwụ ụgwọ maka ọmụmụ akwụkwọ ha". E sere ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi Fire Fly (2011) na China.
